overview: Two Lips and Flower Beds: Blonde, bombshells Bridgette B and Karissa Shannon are rolling around in a beautiful, bed of flowers. They are showing off their gorgeous, tanned goddess bodies and giving the camera everything theyve got. Their amazing asses bounce as they hit the soft bed and their pink lingerie can hardly contain their perfect, round tits. Honestly, a match made in heaven - Bridgette and Karissa beg you with their eyes to come and join the fun!
title: When Girls Play 24
